item.title: whoami
item.description: >>> print('Hello World!') I am Mithun, a young, fresh CS student and Pythonist. I am the sole owner and creator of this personal website. Some quick info about myself: I currently live in 13.0827° N, 80.2707° E. I see myself as a passionate person, who never gives up at the first signs of difficulty. I am very open to have a sneak peek into new experiences, especially if they could teach me something new and productive.
